Compute the average total UMI per cell and UMI variation parameters.

library_estimation.Rd

Compute the average total UMI per cell and UMI variation parameters.

Usage

library_estimation(QC_data, downsample_ratio = 0.7, D2_rough = 0.3)

Arguments

QC_data

Data frame. The QC'd molecular data from obtain_qc_read_umi_table containing columns num_reads, UMI_id, cell_id, and response_id.

downsample_ratio

Numeric. The ratio for downsampling the dataset (default: 0.7). Must be between 0 and 1.

D2_rough

Numeric. Rough estimate of the D2 parameter in the S-M curve model (default: 0.3). Represents the variation parameter in the saturation curve.

Value

A list with elements:

UMI_per_cell

Total UMI per cell parameter

variation

Variation parameter characterizing PCR bias

On this page
